pageContext.claim: “She was also told to illegally back date ballots, many, many ballots received after the deadline. This is something that is so unconstitutional, and she estimates that thousands and thousands of ballots were improperly back dated by her and many others.”
pageContext.analysis: This claim was also rejected by Wayne County Circuit Judge Timothy Kenny. who concluded that election officials were simply filling in fields that had been inadvertently left blank during the initial absentee ballot verification process.
